languages.text: {n}Кибелла ножом вырезает такой же символ себе на обратной стороне ладони и шепчет какую-то молитву.{/n} "Домин'{name}, запомни этот знак. Он есть начало твоего поиска, первый кровавый след".
{n}Kibellah carves the same symbol on the back of her hand with a knife and whispers a prayer.{/n}"Domin'{name}, remember this sign. It is the beginning of your quest, the first blood trail."
languages.original_text: {n}Кибелла ножом вырезает такой же символ себе на обратной стороне ладони и шепчет какую-то молитву.{/n} "Домин'{name}, запомни этот знак. Он есть начало твоего поиска, первый кровавый след".

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah carves the same symbol on the back of her hand with a knife and whispers a prayer.{/n}"Domin'{name}, remember this sign. It is the beginning of your quest, the first blood trail."
{n}Kibellah carves the same symbol on the back of her hand with a knife and whispers a prayer.{/n}"Domin'{name}, remember this sign. It is the beginning of your quest, the first blood trail."
{n}Kibellah carves the same symbol on the back of her hand with a knife and whispers a prayer.{/n}"Domin'{name}, remember this sign. It is the beginning of your quest, the first blood trail."
{n}Kibellah carves the same symbol on the back of her hand with a knife and whispers a prayer.{/n}"Domin'{name}, remember this sign. It is the beginning of your quest, the first blood trail."
{n}Kibellah carves the same symbol on the back of her hand with a knife and whispers a prayer.{/n}"Domin'{name}, remember this sign. It is the beginning of your quest, the first blood trail."

languages.text: {n}绮贝菈抽出匕首，在手背上刻着同样的符号，同时低声祈祷。{/n}“秘者{name}，记住这个符号。这是你探索的开始，也是最初的血迹。”
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah carves the same symbol on the back of her hand with a knife and whispers a prayer.{/n}"Domin'{name}, remember this sign. It is the beginning of your quest, the first blood trail."

traits.locale_text: {n}绮贝菈抽出匕首，在手背上刻着同样的符号，同时低声祈祷。{/n}“秘者{name}，记住这个符号。这是你探索的开始，也是最初的血迹。”

languages.text: {n}Kibellah usa un cuchillo para inscribir el mismo símbolo que tiene en el dorso de la mano mientras musita una plegaria.{/n}«Domin'{name}, recuerde este signo. Es el inicio de su búsqueda, el primer rastro de sangre».
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah carves the same symbol on the back of her hand with a knife and whispers a prayer.{/n}"Domin'{name}, remember this sign. It is the beginning of your quest, the first blood trail."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah usa un cuchillo para inscribir el mismo símbolo que tiene en el dorso de la mano mientras musita una plegaria.{/n}«Domin'{name}, recuerde este signo. Es el inicio de su búsqueda, el primer rastro de sangre».

languages.text: {n}キベラは同じ記号を、ナイフで手の甲につけ、祈りを捧げた。{/n}「ドミン{name}、この記号を覚えておいてください。これがあなたの旅の始まりで、最初の血の跡なのです」
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah carves the same symbol on the back of her hand with a knife and whispers a prayer.{/n}"Domin'{name}, remember this sign. It is the beginning of your quest, the first blood trail."

traits.locale_text: {n}キベラは同じ記号を、ナイフで手の甲につけ、祈りを捧げた。{/n}「ドミン{name}、この記号を覚えておいてください。これがあなたの旅の始まりで、最初の血の跡なのです」

languages.text: {n}Kibellah ritzt mit einem Messer dasselbe Symbol auf ihren Handrücken und flüstert ein Gebet.{/n}"Domin'{name}, merkt Euch dieses Zeichen. Es ist der Beginn Eurer Suche, die erste blutige Spur."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah carves the same symbol on the back of her hand with a knife and whispers a prayer.{/n}"Domin'{name}, remember this sign. It is the beginning of your quest, the first blood trail."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah ritzt mit einem Messer dasselbe Symbol auf ihren Handrücken und flüstert ein Gebet.{/n}"Domin'{name}, merkt Euch dieses Zeichen. Es ist der Beginn Eurer Suche, die erste blutige Spur."

languages.text: {n}Munie d'un couteau, Kibellah grave le même symbole sur le dos de sa main et murmure une prière.{/n} « Mémorisez bien ce symbole, Domin'{name}. C'est le début de votre quête, la première traînée de sang. »
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah carves the same symbol on the back of her hand with a knife and whispers a prayer.{/n}"Domin'{name}, remember this sign. It is the beginning of your quest, the first blood trail."

traits.locale_text: {n}Munie d'un couteau, Kibellah grave le même symbole sur le dos de sa main et murmure une prière.{/n} « Mémorisez bien ce symbole, Domin'{name}. C'est le début de votre quête, la première traînée de sang. »

languages.text: {n}Kibellah, bir bıçakla elinin ardına aynı sembolü kazıyor ve fısıldayarak dua ediyor.{/n} "Domin'{name}, bu işareti unutmayasın. Vazifenin, ilk kan izinin başlangıcıdır."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah carves the same symbol on the back of her hand with a knife and whispers a prayer.{/n}"Domin'{name}, remember this sign. It is the beginning of your quest, the first blood trail."
